issues: Lack of consistent date formatting (e.g., 09/2024 vs. 2024-2025)
Inconsistent bullet point usage in the Education section
suggestions: Standardize date formats throughout the CV (e.g., MM/YYYY or Month YYYY)
Use bullet points consistently for listing items in all sections.

strengths: Demonstrates experience with relevant technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL).
Quantifiable achievements in the hackathon (placed 7th) and website development (technical manager).
weaknesses: Limited depth of experience in server-side development technologies mentioned in the job description (Node.js, Django, Spring Boot).
Lacks concrete examples of experience with database design, system architecture, or testing methodologies.
suggestions: Expand on projects or coursework that demonstrate skills related to server-side development, database management, and system architecture.
Quantify the impact of SEO best practices implemented on the IndabaX Tunisia 2025 website (e.g., increase in website traffic).
Add a section detailing relevant coursework which involves technologies mentioned in the job description.

general.summary: The CV showcases potential with relevant skills and project experience, but it needs to be tailored to the specific requirements of the server-side development role. Highlighting server-side experience and quantifying achievements would significantly improve its impact.
top_priorities: Expand on server-side development experience and technologies.
Provide concrete examples of database design and optimization skills.
Quantify achievements and demonstrate impact in project descriptions.
